channel.title: Health - Hern [Experimental/Ambient Album]
channel.description:
This is the result of me taking a more ambient and less sample-based approach to my music. I wanted to make a more meditative experience while still throwing in some noisy and experimental bits in there, and I think I succeeded in that. I have also been focusing on writing longer songs with slower progressions on this album.
Track list: Health (1:39) Infirmity (10:34) Frost; Prime Prelude (7:40) Prime (15:32) Aurora (6:48) Still Winter (1:55) Spirit Collapse/Decomposition (8:39)
Total Runtime: 52:48
Link is here: https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/sets/health
Hope you guys enjoy. Constructive criticism is welcomed as always.
